name: OnLinewithBillAlexander
0:
”Alexa, open I. Talk Radio Network”
”Alexa, start I. Talk Radio Network”
”Alexa, ask I. Talk Radio Network”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. talk radio network
Developer Terms of Use
des:
OnLine with Bill Alexander: The NETIO Show "The Way Talk Radio Is Meant To Sound On The Internet." Bill Alexander is taking your calls. This is a traditional talk radio show that deals with News, Politics and Whatever is going on in your world. www.OnLinewithBillAlexander.com .

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask iTalkRadio Network to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask iTalkRadio Network to start from first episode”
